UML:Package.name: Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

UML:TaggedValue.value: Requirements View\Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness.xml

Description Sensor, situation, activity, behavior and device information shoul be accesible by developers by a shared and clearly defined interface Measure to check Clearly defined API must be evaluated in studies with developers Rationale As part of the plattform services this is a necessity Reference MPOWER: R2.1.1; SOPRANO R2.1.41; SOPRANO R2.1.42; SOPRANO R2.1.51; SOPRANO R2.1.58 WP: 4,1,3,2 Ranking: 5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should be able to detect if the AP is lying on the bed or sitting on the chair or sofa. Measure to check test in real environment Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference SOPRANO R2.1.53 WP: 4,1 Ranking: 2
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should measure the emotional state of the AP, e.g. stress, mood Measure to check define UC based on emotional state recognition and test in real environment Rationale Important for reacting to depression and other issues Reference OASIS R2.1.37 WP: 4 Ranking: 3
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness
Description The system should be able to identify whether the AP is asleep. Measure to check test in real environment Rationale basis for some use cases Reference SOPRANO R2.1.61 WP: 4 Ranking: 3.5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system provides health monitoring services outside of the home Measure to check test in real environment Rationale to indentify critical health states Reference OASIS R2.1.83 WP: 4,1 Ranking: 3
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description the system should be able to detect critical situations and emergency based on sensor information and vital signs Measure to check at least, exemplary use case based on vital-sign emergency and environmental emergency should be implemented Rationale to indentify critical health states Reference MPOWER: R2.1.1; SOPRANO R2.1.41; SOPRANO R2.1.42; SOPRANO R2.1.51; SOPRANO R2.1.58 WP: 4,1 Ranking: 5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description System should detect when someone is leaving the bed at night Measure to check test in real environment Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference SOPRANO R2.1.62 WP: 4 Ranking: 3.5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description System should be able to store and provide loctations coordinates (GPS) and/or symbolic location of the users inside the home Measure to check define severa UC, extract properties in terms or reliability, resolution, pervasivness and test in real environment accodingly Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference MPOWER R2.1.21; SOPRANO R2.1.34 WP: 4,2,3,1 Ranking: 5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description System should be able to store and provide loctations coordinates (GPS) and/or symbolic location of the users outside the home Measure to check define several UC, extract properties in terms or reliability, resolution, pervasivness and test in real environment accodingly Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference MPOWER R2.1.21; SOPRANO R2.1.34 WP: 4,2,3,1 Ranking: 4
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description Available history of resident location should be stored and provided to applications Measure to check Clearly defined API must be evaluated in studies with developers Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference MPOWER R2.1.32 WP: 4,3,1 Ranking: 4.5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should be able to detect status of relevant devices/sensor in the home, e.g. doors, windows, stove etc., Measure to check At least, status of doors, windows and eletrical appliances must be detectable Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference MPOWER: R2.1.1; SOPRANO R2.1.41; SOPRANO R2.1.42; SOPRANO R2.1.51; SOPRANO R2.1.58 WP: 4,1 Ranking: 5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description System should incorporate and support activity and behaviour recognition based on sensor information Measure to check Easy intergration of algorithms/service for recognition tasks Rationale important for identifying situations of concern Reference OASIS R2.1.20, R2.1.40 WP: 1, 2, 4 Ranking: 4
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness
Description The system is able to monitor vital signs Measure to check test in real environment Rationale to indentify critical health states Reference OASIS R2.1.53 WP: 4,1 Ranking: 5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should be able to detect whether the AP is leaving or entering the home from sensor information Measure to check Should be indentified correctly at least 99% of the time, false-positives less than 5% Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference SOPRANO R2.1.49 WP: 4 Ranking: 3.5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should be able to locate objects in the house. Measure to check define several UC, extract properties in terms or reliability, resolution, pervasivness and test in real environment accodingly Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference SOPRANO R2.1.38 WP: 4,3,1 Ranking: 3.5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should be able to distinguish the AP among the other people present in the house. Measure to check User should be indentified correctly at least 99% of the time, test in real environment, false-positives less than 1% Rationale needed for personalization Reference SOPRANO R2.1.35 WP: 4,3,1 Ranking: 4.5
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness

Description The system should be able to detect information about human movement, e.g. speed, location of movement, anywhere in the house Measure to check define several UC, extract properties in terms or reliability, correctness, pervasivness and test in real environment accodingly Rationale basis for more complex recognition Reference SOPRANO R2.1.50; OASIS R2.1.19 WP: 4 Ranking: 3
Situation and sensor detection and situation awareness
